summary: Get the detailed information for a specific reverse order
description: Get the detailed information for a specific reverse order

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/order/reverse/return/detail/list','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("reverse_order_id", "reverse order id")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/order/reverse/return/detail/list','GET')
request.add_api_param('reverse_order_id', 'reverse order id')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.message: E0105: reverse order id is empty or invalid
error_codes.description: E0105: reverse order id is empty or invalid

error_codes.message: Mp3 Seller not support the api -apipath
error_codes.description: MP3 sellers cannot call the current API, please readthis document for a list of APIs that can be called by MP3 sellers, and you can call the GetSeller API and check the marketplaceEaseMode field to confirm that the current seller is of type MP3.
The reverse ID entered in reverse_order_id does not exist in the current store or is incorrect, call the GetReverseOrdersForSeller API to resynchronize or query for the correct reverse order ID.
